query: Please assist in crafting a 3-day travel plan for a group of 4 people. We plan to leave from Dallas and proceed to Huntsville, spanning from March 13th to March 15th, 2022. We have a budget of $2,700 for this journey. We require entire rooms for accommodations during our stay.
